Lyft Concierge

Reliable rides for your patients

Send and manage rides for your patients — even if they don’t have the Lyft app or a smartphone.

It's easy to get going:

  • Set up on-demand, scheduled, or flexible rides for your patients.
  • Ride details are sent to your patients automatically via text or call.
  • Track rides to make sure patients are getting where they need to go
